<file path="source.swift">
import Foundation

protocol Event:

protocol EventHandler:

class EventBus:
    subscribe(_: H)
    post(_: E)
(handler: H, bus: EventBus)
(lhs: T, rhs: U) -> (T, U)
detailedDebugLog(_: T) -> String

class ReflectionAnalyzer:
    analyze(_: T) -> StructureInfo

class StructureInfo:
    var typeName: String
    var properties: [PropertyInfo]
    var childCount: Int

class PropertyInfo:
    var name: String
    var type: String

class ThreadSafeQueue:
    enqueue(_: T)
    dequeue() -> T?
    makeIterator() -> IndexingIterator<[T]>

class CircularBuffer:
    var startIndex: Int
    var endIndex: Int
    index(after: Int) -> Int
    var count: Int

class ConcurrentEventLogger:
    var monitor: ActivityMonitor
    var delegate: EventLoggerDelegate?
    logEvent(_: E)

protocol EventLoggerDelegate:

class ActivityMonitor:
    record(_: String)
    analyze(_: T) -> StructureInfo
</file>
